name: Fire Bird Spirit Phoenix Beige Oversized-Tee
description:
STORY
Fire Bird Spirit Phoenix Beige Oversized-Tee
Timeless Style Meets Modern Craftsmanship  
This elegant beige oversized T-shirt offers a refined look with premium comfort. Featuring intricate front embroidery, it is the perfect blend of youth style and classic charm for those who appreciate subtle sophistication.


DETAILS

✔️ 100% Pure Cotton- Ultra-soft, breathable fabric ensuring maximum comfort throughout the day.
✔️ Oversized Youth Fit- Relaxed yet stylish silhouette tailored for a trendy, youthful vibe.
✔️ Weight: 240 GSM- High-quality cotton fabric providing durability and a luxurious feel.
✔️ Front Embroidery- The front of the T-shirt boasts detailed embroidery work, adding a tactile, premium finish that enhances the design with depth and elegance.
✔️ Back Puff- The back of the Tshirts showcase firebird in puff where one touches feel the depth and feel of design.
✔️ Colour- Soft beige base providing a neutral canvas that pairs effortlessly with any outfit.
✔️ Made in India- Expert craftsmanship with skilled artisans' attention to detail.


ARTWORK FEATURES

- The embroidery on the front is crafted with high-quality threads for a crisp, refined aesthetic that resists wear.
- Designed to combine understated style with youthful energy, perfect for casual and semi-formal occasions.
- The embroidered details add texture and a distinctive character that sets this T-shirt apart.



WASH CARE

- Turn inside out and wash with cold water to preserve embroidery and fabric softness.
- Use gentle detergents; avoid bleach or dry cleaning to protect delicate embroidery.
- Do not iron directly over the embroidery; use a cloth barrier for longer lasting quality.



This beige front-embroidered T-shirt & back-puff  combines premium materials, intricate artistry, and youthful oversized styling for a versatile wardrobe essential that stands out with subtle elegance.

review.reviewBody: Amazing fabric and premium stitching. Highly recommended!
